AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: TeleCredit DocAction Val
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (((COALESCE(@Processtelecredit@,'.')='CO' AND value in ('CO')) OR ((COALESCE(@Processtelecredit@,'.')='RE' OR COALESCE(@Processtelecredit@,'.')='CL') AND value in ('RE','CL'))))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_Org Legal Entity Not Source Org
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: exists (select 1 from ad_orgtype where ad_orgtype.ad_orgtype_id = ad_org.ad_orgtype_id and islegalentity='Y') AND IsReady='Y' AND ad_org.ad_org_id <> @AD_SourceOrg_ID@

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Transaction Type Val
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: AD_Ref_List.AD_Reference_ID='C1B4345A1F8841C2B1ADD403CA733D75' AND ((COALESCE(@Type@,'')='C' AND AD_Ref_List.Value IN ('P','GL','SCO_CTOB')) OR (COALESCE(@Type@,'')='B' AND AD_Ref_List.Value IN ('P','GL','SCO_T')) OR (COALESCE(@Type@,'') NOT IN ('C','B') AND AD_Ref_List.Value IN ('P','GL')))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Cash Transfer FIN_Financial_Account Val
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: FIN_Financial_Account.C_Currency_ID = @C_Currency_ID@ AND FIN_Financial_Account.em_sco_forapppayment<>'Y' AND FIN_Financial_Account.FIN_Financial_Account_ID<>@FIN_Financial_Account_ID@ AND FIN_Financial_Account.AD_Org_ID = @AD_Org_ID@

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_DocType SCO_PERCEP_PURCH
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_DocType.DocBaseType IN ('SCO_PE') AND C_DocType.IsSOTrx='@IsSOTrx@' AND (AD_ISORGINCLUDED(@AD_Org_ID@,C_DocType.AD_Org_ID, @#AD_Client_ID@) <> '-1' OR COALESCE(@AD_Org_ID@,'-1')='-1') AND COALESCE(@isReturnMaterial@, 'N') = C_DocType.IsReturn AND em_sco_specialdoctype='SCOPPERCEPTIONRECEIPT'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_DocType SCO_AUTODETRAC_DOC
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_DocType.DocBaseType IN ('APP') AND C_DocType.IsSOTrx='@IsSOTrx@' AND (AD_ISORGINCLUDED(@AD_Org_ID@,C_DocType.AD_Org_ID, @#AD_Client_ID@) <> '-1' OR COALESCE(@AD_Org_ID@,'-1')='-1') AND COALESCE(@isReturnMaterial@, 'N') = C_DocType.IsReturn AND em_sco_specialdoctype='SCOAUTODETRACDOCUMENT'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_DocType SCO_Transferinout
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_DocType.DocBaseType IN ('MMM') AND C_DocType.IsSOTrx='@IsSOTrx@' AND (AD_ISORGINCLUDED(@AD_Org_ID@,C_DocType.AD_Org_ID, @#AD_Client_ID@) <> '-1' OR COALESCE(@AD_Org_ID@,'-1')='-1') AND COALESCE(@isReturnMaterial@, 'N') = C_DocType.IsReturn AND em_sco_specialdoctype='SCOTRANSFERDOCUMENT'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_DocType SCO_Billofexchange
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_DocType.DocBaseType IN ('ARI','API') AND C_DocType.IsSOTrx='@IsSOTrx@' AND (AD_ISORGINCLUDED(@AD_Org_ID@,C_DocType.AD_Org_ID, @#AD_Client_ID@) <> '-1' OR COALESCE(@AD_Org_ID@,'-1')='-1') AND COALESCE(@isReturnMaterial@, 'N') = C_DocType.IsReturn AND em_sco_specialdoctype=@SCOSPECIALDOCTYPE@

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Sales Price List ORG
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: M_Pricelist.IsSOPricelist='Y' AND AD_ISORGINCLUDED(@inpOrgId@, M_Pricelist.AD_Org_ID, @AD_Client_ID@) <> -1

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_DocType SCO_FACTORINGINVOICE
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_DocType.DocBaseType IN ('ARI') AND C_DocType.IsSOTrx='@IsSOTrx@' AND (AD_ISORGINCLUDED(@AD_Org_ID@,C_DocType.AD_Org_ID, @#AD_Client_ID@) <> '-1' OR COALESCE(@AD_Org_ID@,'-1')='-1') AND COALESCE(@isReturnMaterial@, 'N') = C_DocType.IsReturn AND em_sco_specialdoctype='SCOFACTORINGINVOICE'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: SCO_Paymentoutfol_Line C_Currency Val
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ((COALESCE(@Paymenttype@,'')='SCO_OTHER' AND C_Currency.C_Currency_ID in (@C_Currency_Finacct_ID@)) OR ( COALESCE(@Paymenttype@,'')<>'SCO_OTHER' AND C_Currency.C_Currency_ID in (@C_Currency_Pfol_ID@, @C_Currency_Finacct_ID@)))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Asset Improv Inv Doc Type Val
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_DocType.em_sco_specialdoctype IN ('SCOAPINVOICE') AND (AD_ISORGINCLUDED(@AD_Org_ID@,C_DocType.AD_Org_ID, @#AD_Client_ID@) <> '-1' OR COALESCE(@AD_Org_ID@,'-1')='-1')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Child Organizations not itself
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: AD_ISORGINCLUDED(ad_org_id, @AD_ORG_ID@, ad_client_id)<>-1 AND ad_org_id <> @AD_ORG_ID@

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: FIN_Financial_Account No APP
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (FIN_Financial_Account.em_sco_forapppayment <> 'Y')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Same IsSOPriceList PEN Pricelist val
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: M_PriceList.IsSOPriceList = @IsSOPriceList@ AND M_PriceList.C_Currency_ID = '308' AND M_PriceList.M_PriceList_ID <> @M_PriceList_ID@

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Perception Purchase Detail Doc Type Val
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_DocType.em_sco_specialdoctype IN ('SCOAPINVOICE') AND (AD_ISORGINCLUDED(@AD_Org_ID@,C_DocType.AD_Org_ID, @#AD_Client_ID@) <> '-1' OR COALESCE(@AD_Org_ID@,'-1')='-1')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Invoice for Reference EM
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Invoice.C_Doctypetarget_ID='@EM_Sco_Doctyperef_ID@' AND C_Invoice.C_BPartner_ID='@C_BPartner_ID@' AND C_Invoice.AD_Org_ID='@AD_Org_ID@'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_Org Child Organizations
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: exists (select 1 from ad_orgtype where ad_orgtype.ad_orgtype_id = ad_org.ad_orgtype_id and islegalentity='N') AND IsReady='Y' AND AD_ORG_ID<>'0'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_Tax C_Tax_IsSOTrx_Date All
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_TAX.VALIDFROM<=COALESCE(@DateInvoiced@,@DateOrdered@) AND (C_TAX.SOPOTYPE =(CASE WHEN @IsSOTrx@ = 'Y' THEN 'S' ELSE 'P' END) OR C_TAX.SOPOTYPE = 'B') AND C_TAX.AD_CLIENT_ID=@AD_CLIENT_ID@ AND C_TAX.C_TAX_ID=(CASE WHEN @IsSOTrx@ = 'Y' AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM AD_ORGINFO WHERE ISTAXUNDEDUCTABLE='Y' AND AD_ORG_ID=@AD_ORG_ID@) THEN (SELECT C_TAX_ID FROM AD_ORGINFO WHERE ISTAXUNDEDUCTABLE='Y' AND AD_ORG_ID=@AD_ORG_ID@) ELSE C_TAX.C_TAX_ID END)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Period of Year
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Year_ID = @C_Year_ID@

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: FIN_PaymentMethods PO with accounts
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM FIN_FinAcc_PaymentMethod fapm WHERE FIN_PaymentMethod.FIN_PaymentMethod_ID=fapm.FIN_PaymentMethod_ID AND fapm.Payout_Allow = 'Y')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_DocType SCO_SWITHHOLDING_RECEIPT
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_DocType.DocBaseType IN ('SCO_WL') AND C_DocType.IsSOTrx='@IsSOTrx@' AND (AD_ISORGINCLUDED(@AD_Org_ID@,C_DocType.AD_Org_ID, @#AD_Client_ID@) <> '-1' OR COALESCE(@AD_Org_ID@,'-1')='-1') AND COALESCE(@isReturnMaterial@, 'N') = C_DocType.IsReturn AND em_sco_specialdoctype='SCOSWITHHOLDINGRECEIPT'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_DocType SCO_FixedCash_Reposition
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_DocType.DocBaseType IN ('APP') AND (AD_ISORGINCLUDED(@AD_Org_ID@,C_DocType.AD_Org_ID, @#AD_Client_ID@) <> '-1' OR COALESCE(@AD_Org_ID@,'-1')='-1') AND COALESCE(@isReturnMaterial@, 'N') = C_DocType.IsReturn AND em_sco_specialdoctype='SCOFIXEDCASHREPOSITION'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: sco_telecredit_line Doc Type Val
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_DocType.em_sco_specialdoctype IN ('SCOAPINVOICE','SCOAPSIMPLEPROVISIONINVOICE') AND (AD_ISORGINCLUDED(@AD_Org_ID@,C_DocType.AD_Org_ID, @#AD_Client_ID@) <> '-1' OR COALESCE(@AD_Org_ID@,'-1')='-1')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Withholding SUNAT Serial
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: AD_Client_ID = @AD_Client_ID@ AND AD_ISORGINCLUDED(@AD_ORG_ID@,ad_org_id,@AD_CLIENT_ID@)<>-1 AND serietype = 'SCO_WITHHO'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Sales Withholding Receipt Lines Doc Type Val
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_DocType.em_sco_specialdoctype IN ('SCOARINVOICE') AND (AD_ISORGINCLUDED(@AD_Org_ID@,C_DocType.AD_Org_ID, @#AD_Client_ID@) <> '-1' OR COALESCE(@AD_Org_ID@,'-1')='-1')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Dest Org Price List
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: AD_Client_ID = @AD_Client_ID@ AND AD_ISORGINCLUDED(M_PriceList.AD_Org_ID,@AD_DestOrg_ID@,@AD_Client_ID@) <> -1 AND isactive = 'Y'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_DocType SCO_RendCuentas
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_DocType.DocBaseType IN ('SCO_ACC') AND (AD_ISORGINCLUDED(@AD_Org_ID@,C_DocType.AD_Org_ID, @#AD_Client_ID@) <> '-1' OR COALESCE(@AD_Org_ID@,'-1')='-1') AND COALESCE(@isReturnMaterial@, 'N') = C_DocType.IsReturn AND em_sco_specialdoctype='SCOACCOUNTABILITY'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Standard Period of Org
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: AD_ISORGINCLUDED(C_Period.ad_org_id,@AD_Org_ID@,@#AD_Client_ID@) <> -1 AND C_Period.periodtype = 'S'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_DocType SCO_TELECREDIT
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_DocType.DocBaseType IN ('APP') AND C_DocType.IsSOTrx='@IsSOTrx@' AND (AD_ISORGINCLUDED(@AD_Org_ID@,C_DocType.AD_Org_ID, @#AD_Client_ID@) <> '-1' OR COALESCE(@AD_Org_ID@,'-1')='-1') AND COALESCE(@isReturnMaterial@, 'N') = C_DocType.IsReturn AND em_sco_specialdoctype='SCOAPTELECREDIT'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: G/L Journal Batch and Standalone Line Val
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ((COALESCE(@SCO_STANDALONEGLJOURNAL@,'.')='Y' AND AD_ORG_ID=@SCO_StandAloneGLJournal_Org@ AND IsReady='Y') OR (COALESCE(@SCO_STANDALONEGLJOURNAL@,'.')<>'Y' AND (AD_ISORGINCLUDED(ad_org.ad_org_id, @Batch_Org@, ad_org.ad_client_id)<>-1 AND IsReady='Y')))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Financial Account Type SCR_F
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (FIN_Financial_Account.type='SCR_F' AND ((SELECT count(*) FROM SCO_User_Perm_Finaccount UPF where UPF.ad_user_id = @#AD_USER_ID@)=0 OR fin_financial_account.fin_financial_account_id IN (SELECT UPF.fin_financial_account_id FROM SCO_User_Perm_Finaccount UPF WHERE UPF.ad_user_id = @#AD_USER_ID@ AND UPF.isactive='Y')))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_BPartner Payment Terms Val
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ((COALESCE(@EM_Sco_Specialmethod@,'.')='SCOBILLOFEXCHANGE') OR (COALESCE(@EM_Sco_Specialmethod@,'.')<>'SCOBILLOFEXCHANGE') AND (em_sco_isboeterm<>'Y' OR em_sco_isboeterm IS NULL))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_DocType SCO_LOAN_DOC
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_DocType.DocBaseType IN ('API') AND C_DocType.IsSOTrx='@IsSOTrx@' AND (AD_ISORGINCLUDED(@AD_Org_ID@,C_DocType.AD_Org_ID, @#AD_Client_ID@) <> '-1' OR COALESCE(@AD_Org_ID@,'-1')='-1') AND COALESCE(@isReturnMaterial@, 'N') = C_DocType.IsReturn AND em_sco_specialdoctype='SCOLOANDOC'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Prepayment PreOrder Doc Type Val
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_DocType.em_sco_specialdoctype IN ('SREPURCHASEORDER') AND (AD_ISORGINCLUDED(@AD_Org_ID@,C_DocType.AD_Org_ID, @#AD_Client_ID@) <> '-1' OR COALESCE(@AD_Org_ID@,'-1')='-1')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: EEFF Category Group Validation
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (((COALESCE(@type@,'')='SCO_BG' AND AD_Ref_List.Value IN ('SCO_BG_TA','SCO_BG_TP','SCO_BG_TPI')) OR (COALESCE(@type@,'')='SCO_GPN' AND AD_Ref_List.Value IN ('SCO_GPF_V','SCO_GPF_OIE')) OR (COALESCE(@type@,'')='SCO_GPF' AND AD_Ref_List.Value IN ('SCO_GPN_NONE')) OR (COALESCE(@type@,'')='SCO_ESF' AND AD_Ref_List.Value IN ('SCO_BG_TA','SCO_BG_TP','SCO_BG_TPI')) OR (COALESCE(@type@,'')='SCO_ER' AND AD_Ref_List.Value IN ('SCO_ER_ER')) OR (COALESCE(@type@,'')='SCO_ERI' AND AD_Ref_List.Value IN ('SCO_ERI_ERI')) OR (COALESCE(@type@,'')='SCO_FLEF_MD' AND AD_Ref_List.Value IN ('SCO_FLEF_MD_FLEF_MD'))) AND AD_Ref_List.AD_Reference_ID = '568A2F68B967490780C6CAF3695798A0')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: BOE FROM Doc Type Val
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ((COALESCE(@specialdoctype@,'') = 'SCOINVOICEXBOE' AND C_DocType.em_sco_specialdoctype = 'SCOARINVOICE') OR (COALESCE(@specialdoctype@,'') = 'SCOBOEXBOE' AND C_DocType.em_sco_specialdoctype IN ('SCOARBOEINVOICE')) OR (COALESCE(@specialdoctype@,'') = 'SCOAPINVOICEXBOE' AND C_DocType.em_sco_specialdoctype IN ('SCOAPINVOICE','SCOAPBOEINVOICE'))) AND (AD_ISORGINCLUDED(@AD_Org_ID@,C_DocType.AD_Org_ID, @#AD_Client_ID@) <> '-1' OR COALESCE(@AD_Org_ID@,'-1')='-1')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: User Permission Finacc Validation Rule
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: AD_ISORGINCLUDED(FIN_Financial_Account.ad_org_id, @AD_Finacc_Org_ID@, FIN_Financial_Account.ad_client_id)<>-1

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Validation Not CBPartner Itself
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: c_bpartner_id <> @C_BPartner_ID@

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_DocType SCO_Prepayment
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_DocType.DocBaseType IN ('API') AND (AD_ISORGINCLUDED(@AD_Org_ID@,C_DocType.AD_Org_ID, @#AD_Client_ID@) <> '-1' OR COALESCE(@AD_Org_ID@,'-1')='-1') AND COALESCE(@isReturnMaterial@, 'N') = C_DocType.IsReturn AND em_sco_specialdoctype='SCOPREPAYMENT'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Telecredit Lines Doc Type Val
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_DocType.em_sco_specialdoctype IN ('SCOAPPAYMENT') AND (AD_ISORGINCLUDED(@AD_Org_ID@,C_DocType.AD_Org_ID, @#AD_Client_ID@) <> '-1' OR COALESCE(@AD_Org_ID@,'-1')='-1')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: SCO_A_Asset RetirementAction Val
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ((COALESCE(@EM_Sco_Asset_Status@,'.')='SCO_ACT' AND value in ('SCO_RET')) OR (COALESCE(@EM_Sco_Asset_Status@,'.')='SCO_RET' AND value in ('SCO_RE')))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Source Org Price List
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: AD_Client_ID = @AD_Client_ID@ AND AD_ISORGINCLUDED(M_PriceList.AD_Org_ID,@AD_SourceOrg_ID@,@AD_Client_ID@) <> -1 AND isactive = 'Y'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_City of Region
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (C_City.C_Region_ID=@C_Region_ID@ AND ((COALESCE(@C_Country_ID@,'')<>'' AND C_City.C_Country_ID = @C_Country_ID@) OR (COALESCE(@C_Country_ID@,'')='')))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_DocType SCO_BOE_TO_DISCOUNT
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_DocType.DocBaseType IN ('ARI') AND C_DocType.IsSOTrx='@IsSOTrx@' AND (AD_ISORGINCLUDED(@AD_Org_ID@,C_DocType.AD_Org_ID, @#AD_Client_ID@) <> '-1' OR COALESCE(@AD_Org_ID@,'-1')='-1') AND COALESCE(@isReturnMaterial@, 'N') = C_DocType.IsReturn AND em_sco_specialdoctype='SCOBOEXDISCOUNT'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_Order Payment Terms Val
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ((COALESCE(@EM_Sco_Specialmethod@,'.')='SCOBILLOFEXCHANGE') OR (COALESCE(@EM_Sco_Specialmethod@,'.')<>'SCOBILLOFEXCHANGE') AND (em_sco_isboeterm<>'Y' OR em_sco_isboeterm IS NULL))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_DocType SCO_PWITHHOLDING_RECEIPT
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_DocType.DocBaseType IN ('SCO_WL') AND C_DocType.IsSOTrx='@IsSOTrx@' AND (AD_ISORGINCLUDED(@AD_Org_ID@,C_DocType.AD_Org_ID, @#AD_Client_ID@) <> '-1' OR COALESCE(@AD_Org_ID@,'-1')='-1') AND COALESCE(@isReturnMaterial@, 'N') = C_DocType.IsReturn AND em_sco_specialdoctype='SCOPWITHHOLDINGRECEIPT'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: APPPayment FIN_Financial_Account Restriction
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM FIN_FinAcc_PaymentMethod fapm WHERE fapm.FIN_Financial_Account_ID = FIN_Financial_Account.FIN_Financial_Account_ID AND fapm.FIN_Paymentmethod_ID = @FIN_Paymentmethod_ID@ AND fapm.Payin_Allow = (SELECT CASE WHEN '@FIN_ISRECEIPT@'='Y' THEN 'Y' ELSE fapm.Payin_Allow END FROM DUAL) AND fapm.Payout_Allow = (SELECT CASE WHEN '@FIN_ISRECEIPT@'='N' THEN 'Y' ELSE fapm.Payout_Allow END FROM DUAL)) AND ((COALESCE(@EM_Sco_Isapppayment@,'')='Y' AND FIN_Financial_Account.em_sco_forapppayment = 'Y') OR (COALESCE(@EM_Sco_Isapppayment@,'')<>'Y' AND FIN_Financial_Account.em_sco_forapppayment = 'N' AND ((SELECT count(*) FROM SCO_User_Perm_Finaccount UPF where UPF.ad_user_id = @#AD_USER_ID@)=0 OR fin_financial_account.fin_financial_account_id IN (SELECT UPF.fin_financial_account_id FROM SCO_User_Perm_Finaccount UPF WHERE UPF.ad_user_id = @#AD_USER_ID@ AND UPF.isactive='Y')) )) AND ((COALESCE(@em_ssa_paymentin_doctype@,'') IN ('INMEDIATE_CASH') AND FIN_Financial_Account.type = 'C') OR (COALESCE(@em_ssa_paymentin_doctype@,'') NOT IN ('INMEDIATE_CASH'))) AND (((COALESCE(@em_sco_applicationtype@,'')='SCO_COMP' OR COALESCE(@em_sco_recvapplicationtype@,'')='SCO_COMP') AND FIN_Financial_Account.type = 'SCO_LO') OR ((COALESCE(@em_sco_applicationtype@,'')<>'SCO_COMP' AND COALESCE(@em_sco_recvapplicationtype@,'')<>'SCO_COMP') AND FIN_Financial_Account.type <> 'SCO_LO'))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_Invoice Payment Terms Val
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ((COALESCE(@EM_Sco_Specialmethod@,'.')='SCOBILLOFEXCHANGE') OR (COALESCE(@EM_Sco_Specialmethod@,'.')<>'SCOBILLOFEXCHANGE') AND (em_sco_isboeterm<>'Y' OR em_sco_isboeterm IS NULL))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Factoring Invoice Lines Doc Type Val
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_DocType.em_sco_specialdoctype IN ('SCOARINVOICE') AND (AD_ISORGINCLUDED(@AD_Org_ID@,C_DocType.AD_Org_ID, @#AD_Client_ID@) <> '-1' OR COALESCE(@AD_Org_ID@,'-1')='-1')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: BOE To Collection Lines Doc Type Val
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_DocType.em_sco_specialdoctype IN ('SCOARBOEINVOICE') AND (AD_ISORGINCLUDED(@AD_Org_ID@,C_DocType.AD_Org_ID, @#AD_Client_ID@) <> '-1' OR COALESCE(@AD_Org_ID@,'-1')='-1')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_DocType SCO_INTERNAL_DOC
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_DocType.DocBaseType IN ('API') AND (AD_ISORGINCLUDED(@AD_Org_ID@,C_DocType.AD_Org_ID, @#AD_Client_ID@) <> '-1' OR COALESCE(@AD_Org_ID@,'-1')='-1') AND COALESCE(@isReturnMaterial@, 'N') = C_DocType.IsReturn AND em_sco_specialdoctype='SCOINTERNALDOCUMENT'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Asset Inv Lines Doc Type Val
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_DocType.em_sco_specialdoctype IN ('SCOARINVOICE','SCOAPINVOICE') AND (AD_ISORGINCLUDED(@AD_Org_ID@,C_DocType.AD_Org_ID, @#AD_Client_ID@) <> '-1' OR COALESCE(@AD_Org_ID@,'-1')='-1')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: FIN_Payment Windows Validation
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: exists(SELECT 1 FROM AD_Tab t WHERE t.AD_Window_ID = AD_Window.AD_Window_ID AND t.tablevel=0 AND t.ad_table_id = 'D1A97202E832470285C9B1EB026D54E2' LIMIT 1)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: FIN_Financial_Account type and currency val
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (FIN_Financial_Account.type='B' and (FIN_Financial_Account.em_sco_forapppayment <> 'Y') AND FIN_Financial_Account.C_Currency_ID = @C_Currency_ID@ AND ((SELECT count(*) FROM SCO_User_Perm_Finaccount UPF where UPF.ad_user_id = @#AD_USER_ID@)=0 OR fin_financial_account.fin_financial_account_id IN (SELECT UPF.fin_financial_account_id FROM SCO_User_Perm_Finaccount UPF WHERE UPF.ad_user_id = @#AD_USER_ID@ AND UPF.isactive='Y')))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: G/L Journal Batch and Standalone Val
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ((COALESCE(@SCO_STANDALONEGLJOURNAL@,'.')='Y' AND AD_ORG_ID <> '0' AND IsReady='Y') OR (COALESCE(@SCO_STANDALONEGLJOURNAL@,'.')<>'Y' AND (AD_ISORGINCLUDED(ad_org.ad_org_id, @Batch_Org@, ad_org.ad_client_id)<>-1 AND IsReady='Y')))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Year of Calendar
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Calendar_ID = @C_Calendar_ID@

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Invoice (em_sco_invoiceref_id) Doc Type Val
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (((COALESCE(@SCOSPECIALDOCTYPE@,'') = 'SCOARCREDITMEMO' OR COALESCE(@SCOSPECIALDOCTYPE@,'') = 'SCOARDEBITMEMO') AND C_DocType.em_sco_specialdoctype IN ('SCOARINVOICE', 'SCOARCREDITMEMO', 'SCOARDEBITMEMO', 'SCOARTICKET')) OR ((COALESCE(@SCOSPECIALDOCTYPE@,'') = 'SCOAPCREDITMEMO' OR COALESCE(@SCOSPECIALDOCTYPE@,'') = 'SCOAPINVOICE') AND C_DocType.em_sco_specialdoctype IN ('SCOAPINVOICE', 'SCOAPCREDITMEMO')) OR (COALESCE(@SCOSPECIALDOCTYPE@,'') = 'SCOARINVOICERETURNMAT' AND C_DocType.em_sco_specialdoctype IN ('SCOARINVOICE', 'SCOARTICKET'))) AND (AD_ISORGINCLUDED(@AD_Org_ID@,C_DocType.AD_Org_ID, @#AD_Client_ID@) <> '-1' OR COALESCE(@AD_Org_ID@,'-1')='-1')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Perception SUNAT Serial
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: AD_Client_ID = @AD_Client_ID@ AND AD_ISORGINCLUDED(@AD_ORG_ID@,ad_org_id,@AD_CLIENT_ID@)<>-1 AND serietype = 'SCO_PERC'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Purchase Withholding Receipt Lines Doc Type Val
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_DocType.em_sco_specialdoctype IN ('SCOAPINVOICE') AND (AD_ISORGINCLUDED(@AD_Org_ID@,C_DocType.AD_Org_ID, @#AD_Client_ID@) <> '-1' OR COALESCE(@AD_Org_ID@,'-1')='-1')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: SCO_Billofexchange Payment Terms Val
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ((COALESCE(@Specialmethod@,'.')='SCOBILLOFEXCHANGE' AND em_sco_isboeterm='Y') OR (COALESCE(@Specialmethod@,'.')<>'SCOBILLOFEXCHANGE') AND (em_sco_isboeterm<>'Y' OR em_sco_isboeterm IS NULL))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: User Permission Finacc AD_Org Validation
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: exists (select 1 from ad_orgtype where ad_orgtype.ad_orgtype_id = ad_org.ad_orgtype_id and islegalentity='Y') AND IsReady='Y' AND Ad_Org_ID!='0' AND AD_ISORGINCLUDED(ad_org.ad_org_id, @AD_Org_ID@, ad_org.ad_client_id)<>-1

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: FIN_Financial_Account Bank Type
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (FIN_Financial_Account.type='B' and (FIN_Financial_Account.em_sco_forapppayment <> 'Y') AND ((SELECT count(*) FROM SCO_User_Perm_Finaccount UPF where UPF.ad_user_id = @#AD_USER_ID@)=0 OR fin_financial_account.fin_financial_account_id IN (SELECT UPF.fin_financial_account_id FROM SCO_User_Perm_Finaccount UPF WHERE UPF.ad_user_id = @#AD_USER_ID@ AND UPF.isactive='Y')))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_BPartner PO Payment Terms Val
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ((COALESCE(@EM_Sco_Pospecialmethod@,'.')='SCOBILLOFEXCHANGE') OR (COALESCE(@EM_Sco_Pospecialmethod@,'.')<>'SCOBILLOFEXCHANGE') AND (em_sco_isboeterm<>'Y' OR em_sco_isboeterm IS NULL))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Purchase Document Doc Type Val
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_DocType.em_sco_specialdoctype IN ('SCOAPINVOICE','SCOAPSIMPLEPROVISIONINVOICE') AND (AD_ISORGINCLUDED(@AD_Org_ID@,C_DocType.AD_Org_ID, @#AD_Client_ID@) <> '-1' OR COALESCE(@AD_Org_ID@,'-1')='-1')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Sales Perception Receipt Detail Doc Type Val
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_DocType.em_sco_specialdoctype IN ('SCOARINVOICE','SCOARDEBITMEMO') AND (AD_ISORGINCLUDED(@AD_Org_ID@,C_DocType.AD_Org_ID, @#AD_Client_ID@) <> '-1' OR COALESCE(@AD_Org_ID@,'-1')='-1')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_DocType SCO_Percep_Sales
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_DocType.DocBaseType IN ('SCO_PE') AND C_DocType.IsSOTrx='@IsSOTrx@' AND (AD_ISORGINCLUDED(@AD_Org_ID@,C_DocType.AD_Org_ID, @#AD_Client_ID@) <> '-1' OR COALESCE(@AD_Org_ID@,'-1')='-1') AND COALESCE(@isReturnMaterial@, 'N') = C_DocType.IsReturn AND em_sco_specialdoctype='SCOSPERCEPTIONRECEIPT'
